data.message: Hoping FB will give me BACK my nickname because I still see millions of people using names that they werent born with -_-

replies.message: Hey there. Requiring people to use their authentic  name on Facebook helps keep our community safe. You can list a nickname on your account by following the steps listed here: http://bit.ly/2bb48fz. -Jessica

Jessica.. I've done this already.. Your FB community is safe. Your policy isnt fair because there are millions of people that you dont hold this rule to and this is the reply me and my partner get every time we ask. Mind you.. there are thousands of fake Beyonce's, Minaj, etc etc... smh...
